sender.description: Sender is the that actor that signed the messages

admin.description: Admin is an optional address that can execute migrations

codeId.description: CodeID is the reference to the stored WASM code

label.description: Label is optional metadata to be stored with a contract instance.

msg.description: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract on instantiation

funds.description: Funds coins that are transferred to the contract on instantiation

salt.description: Salt is an arbitrary value provided by the sender. Size can be 1 to 64.

fixMsg.description: FixMsg include the msg value into the hash for the predictable address. Default is false

MsgInstantiateContract2.title: Msg Instantiate Contract 2
MsgInstantiateContract2.description: MsgInstantiateContract2 create a new smart contract instance for the given code id with a predicable address.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
